skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: ronaldo facts
des:
Cristiano Ronaldo, the Portugal and Juventus star is a true global icon. 

From growing up in the same island of Madeira , Ronaldo become one of the world's greatest ever footballers, breaking records everywhere he's played - from Sporting Lisbon, to Manchester United, to Real Madrid and now at Italian champions Juventus. 

You may think you knew evertything there was to know about Ronaldo but here at Ronaldo - Could it be true? we go that little bit further. 

We bring you everything you hoped was true about your favourite footballer

While we double and triple check each and every fact, if they turn out to be unproven then don't worry too much - at least they'll have made you laugh and smile!

So sit back, relax and learn a little bit more about Cristiano Ronaldo
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
